title: still have not recieved demacia icon
body:
I tried posting this earlier but it didn't go through. Hopefully there isn't a duplicate of this thread.

Anyway, I followed the steps to get the Demacia Icon when the offer was active (i believe during the last week of its validity) and I still have not received it. I've received the two xayah / rakan icons fine and that is a promotion after the Demacia one. T_T

replies.body:
Hey there,

I believe distribution for this icon has already concluded, you'll have to [contact Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to confirm whether or not you completed the steps required to receive this icon.
